issue.title: [CI] [Archery] Cmake linter should have better messages when lines are too long
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14646](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14646). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Example: https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/4155303078?check_suite_focus=true#step:7:1061

error is: 
`ERROR __main__.py:618: Check failed: /arrow/cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake`

when a line was too long.
